entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
